show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Today’s program- Exposing the War on Whistleblowers- Supporting the Freedom of Information. Join us as we pull back the... <!--more--> curtain on government censors as they continue to try to shoot the messengers of the free press— in the first segment we’ll speak with bestselling muckraker Greg Palast and we talk to Christian Stork of WhoWhatWhy.
com; at the bottom of the hour we’re joined by Professor of Law Molly Shaffer Van Houweling, Faculty Director, Berkeley Center for Law & Technology about the Aaron Swartz case and beyond…But first the KPFA news headlines.
Please stay with us.
